name: Sarv and Ruv Underground style [SKIN]
description:
Skins for Ruv and Sarv that trys to imitate style of sprites from song "Underground" from mod "Whitty Definitive Edition". 
It's been used in Psycho Engine.
It's includes Ruv and Sarvente Lucifer sprites with Icons.
Alternative: https://gamebanana.com/mods/372443
